Title: Jews on a Plane
Writer: Naomi Ekperigin (staff writer), Ilana Glazer (created by), Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (created by), Abbi Jacobson, Achilles Stamatelaky (staff writer)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Seth Green, Tracee Ellis Ross
Plot: Abbi gets her period while on an airplane and enlists Ilana's help to find a tampon.
